description: This file defines a utility class ApiRequestContextHolder that manages a ThreadLocal storage of ApiRequestContext objects. It provides methods to get, set, and clear the context for API requests within the scope of a thread, typical in web applications to maintain request-specific data.

classes.name: ApiRequestContextHolder
classes.description: A final utility class that provides static methods to handle ApiRequestContext objects stored in ThreadLocal scope for each thread/request.

methods.name: clearContext
methods.description: Removes the ApiRequestContext instance from the ThreadLocal storage for the current thread.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Retrieves the ApiRequestContext for the current thread, creating a new instance if none exists, and logs the creation.
